description: ‘Codole’ is the nickname of the family that runs this restaurant and whose ancestors once worked in the copper mines in the area. Today, the family has exchanged mining for cooking, offering guests specialities such as ricotta and black truffle ravioli with a lamb ragù, and loin of venison in a porcini mushroom crust.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
